@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Darrenrulez, post:10, topic:442461”]@As for your problem, you can’t just ‘add a command’ without declaring or defining certain variables and methods the command calls…

This^ is exactly what I needed help with , should’ve word’d my sentences better , was too baked tbh.[/quote]

I don’t give two shits if you smoke, don’t announce it to the world, no one cares. I smoke, but I don’t announce it to everyone; it’s not ‘cool’ to smoke. kthx.

As for your problem:
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

item.title: Help me with my RSPS Please!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Darrenrulez, post:4, topic:442461”]I didn’t ask for your help your just a junior member , and as for spoon feeding? you call it spoon feeding when you don’t have a clue what i’m even talking about. People don’t just teach themselves everything without any guidance or knowledge , this is a help community , not a self help. I did state that I didn’t know what I was doing and I needed help , not a retarded opinion from admiral dipshit. And as for giving up , I can promise you I know more about developing rsps than you , I have no reason to give up because some 12 yr old kid can’t help.
And you never gave me any “hints” either , you gave me completely wrong facts about a completely different situation altogether. re-read what you posted.[/quote]
Firstly sir, you are a dumbass. You need to learn who you elders are, I know Onix personally, his skill is much better than yours at any time. You need to listen to him and what he is telling you, were not gonna spoon-feed you. I would help you if you would learn some respect and not just assume you are better than someone when you are actually not.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with my RSPS Please!

item.description:
@Darrenrulez wrote:

I just want a command where i can type if(command[0]=(“givedonor playername”) && player.getRights() > 2
&& player.getDonor() == 1) {
player.giveDonor;
}

or something similar to this , I don’t know what i would put the command as

item.source: Help me with my RSPS Please!

item.title: Help me with my RSPS Please!
item.dc:creator: @Darrenrulez Darrenrulez
item.description:
@Darrenrulez wrote:

Ok i guess that kinda helps but im still unsure of how to add the premium system altogether to my server

there is one section of code in the commands.java that involves donor rights but I don’t think it was finished off or the system wasn’t complted because theres no code such as (“givedonor &name&”). heres the code thats in commands.java :

}
if (player.getDonor() > 0 || player.getRights() >= 1) {
donorCommands(player, command);
}
} catch (Throwable e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

public static void donorCommands(final Player player, String[] command) {
	if (command[0].equals("yell")) {
		String yell = getCompleteString(command, 1);
		for (Player pl : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) {
			pl.sendMessage("[<img="
					+ (player.getRights() == 0 ? 2 : player.getRights() - 1)
					+ ">"
					+ Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername())
					+ "]: <col=ff00ff>" + yell);
		}
	}
}

I just don’t know how to implement a code to give other players the rights for donor status , could I be a pain in the ass and request your help again?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my RSPS Please!

item.title: Help me with my RSPS Please!
item.dc:creator: @Darrenrulez Darrenrulez
item.description:
@Darrenrulez wrote:

I need someone to help me with my 637 runescape private server! I’m doing excellent with it but i’m unable to do a few things like adding a donator / premium feature , I’m not sure how to add the code , i tried :

if(command[0]=(“givedonor”));
player.getRights() == 2);
player.getRights() > 1 %playername%
}else{
player.sendMessage(“you do not have permission to execute this command”)

I’m not very educated in this type of area as i’ve basically taught myself how to do everything , any help would be greatly appreciated!

I’m also looking for someone to help me work on my server with me and I am willing to pay!

I also need help jar’ing and signing my client and hosting it online, I’ve tried to jar it and it worked fine , but the server doesn’t run within the .jar process.

Anyone willing to help work with me on my server just add me on skype or messge me on here and ill add you , skype name : Darrenrulez1.

Read full topic
